query.default: select * from LocalActs_Reports_AppWorkStatReport temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId

query.mssql: create table {0} ([Manager] nvarchar(max), [Approver] nvarchar(max), [DocumentCount] int, [TotalAssignCount] int, [DoneAssignCount] int, [InWorkAssignCount] int, [AverageApproveTime] float, [OverdueCount] int, [OverdueAverageValue] float, [IsDepartment] bit, [Id] int, [Parent] int, [ReportSessionId] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL)
query.postgres: create table {0} ([Manager] citext, [Approver] citext, [DocumentCount] int, [TotalAssignCount] int, [DoneAssignCount] int, [InWorkAssignCount] int, [AverageApproveTime] float, [OverdueCount] int, [OverdueAverageValue] float, [IsDepartment] boolean, [Id] int, [Parent] int, [ReportSessionId] citext NOT NULL)
